channel.title: Error connecting to server
channel.description: I downloaded a client and a source. The first thing i did was go into the client.java and change the real owners no-ip to my no-ip. Then i went to the client egui.java and changed the 0.0.0.0 to my no-ip. I then compiled everything. So next i ran my server and my no-ip DUC and compressed the client and sent it to my friend. He ran in and when he tried to join it said error connecting to server. I have portforwarded and dont know why he cant connect. Is there any way to see if my port is accsesible without using the program that portforward.com supplies? I ask not to use porforward.com's program because it requires u to have a static-ip (or whatever its called) and i use no-ip to do that for me! Please help me to help my friend join my server!
